idea-plugin.name: Ayu Islands
idea-plugin.description:
Warm, refined color themes for JetBrains IDEs — three Ayu palettes with modern Islands UI.

Features

  • 6 themes — Ayu Mirage, Ayu Dark, and Ayu Light, each in classic and Islands UI variants
  • 20+ language highlights — Java, C#/.NET, Rust, Go, Python, JS/TS, HCL/Terraform, Kotlin, Scala, Dart, Ruby, PHP, HTML/CSS, SQL, Bash, YAML, JSON, XML, Markdown
  • Islands UI — rounded panels, island gaps, and compact mode support
  • Canonical ayu-colors — syntax palettes from ayu-theme/ayu-colors
  • Full VCS integration — tuned diff gutters, file status colors, and 16-color terminal palette
  • Verified on 12 IDEs — IntelliJ IDEA, PyCharm, WebStorm, GoLand, RustRover, Rider, PhpStorm, CLion, DataGrip, RubyMine
